verbs.description: North Korea dictator Kim Jong Un [V: has] accepted an invitation to the White House , President Donald Trump said Tuesday , raising the prospect of the U.S. welcoming the leader of one of the most brutal and repressive regimes in modern history . Trump praised the North Korean dictator , saying he has a " great personality " and " a very talented man . "

Trump praised the North Korean dictator , [ARGM-ADV: saying he has a " great personality " and " a] very talented man . "
